MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 19-NOV-2020 02:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30pm due to urgent repairs required on the network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:35pm on 18th November 2020
